entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:25 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
